item.title: Trying out Emacs Again
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: I'm a Vim user, but i'm not 100% sold on it. I keep wanting to find an even better editor. I've tried just about everything but nothing sticks. I'm starting a new book on Lisp programming so it is time to try Emacs again. May this time it will stick.
